What exactly do you do?

I do a couple things.

  • First and foremost, I help small business owners and entrepreneurs navigate the confusing world of web development.
  • Second, I choose technologies and build websites that suit the specific needs of their business.
  • And third, I write web copy that helps their business express who they are and what they sell

Web Developer

Tired of design agencies forcing their favourite website solution on you? The truth is: there are a thousand and one ways to build a website. Let's find out which solution is best for your business.

Learn More

Copywriter

Struggling to find the right words to express yourself and your businesss? Are you worried your copy won't entice your readers? Click the button below and find out how we can fix that.

Learn More

Website Auditor

Is your website slow or not generating sales? Are you looking for a second opinion after meeting with an agency or web developer? My primary goal is to ensure small businesses and entrepreneurs can navigate the confusing world wide web with ease and comfort.

Learn More

Who is Ken?



About:

I've been writing since he was a child and building websites since the early 2000's when I was in middle school.


Education:

  • 2013 graduate of Algonquin College's Professional Writing program
  • 2020 graduate of St. Lawrence College's Computer Programmer Analyst program

A Final Message:

I'm never going to sell you a solution you don't need. We can find a good solution on your budget. I promise.
